TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager, class System.IServiceProvider
Public Class WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager Implements IDesignerSerializationManager, IServiceProvider
type WorkflowMarkupSerializationManager = class interface IDesignerSerializationManager interface IServiceProvider

summary.span: 管理工作流的与可扩展应用程序标记语言 (XAML) 之间的设计时序列化。

span.span: Manages design-time serialization to and from extensible Application Markup Language (XAML) for workflows.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/includes/deprecatedcontent-md.md)] 工作流或活动设计器可以使用 来访问对于管理设计时序列化过程很有用的服务。A workflow or activity designer can use to access services useful to managing design-time serialization processes. 例如， 可用于创建对象、查找类型、标识对象以及自定义特定类型的序列化。For example, can be used to create objects, look up types, identify objects, and customize the serialization of particular types.

summary.span: 向序列化管理器添加指定的序列化提供程序。

span.span: Adds the specified serialization provider to the serialization manager.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 向序列化管理器添加自定义的序列化提供程序。 adds a custom serialization provider to the serialization manager. 序列化提供程序可以为特定类型的对象或特定类型的对象集提供自定义序列化程序。Serialization providers can provide custom serializers for a particular type of object or set of types of objects. 在序列化期间，将查询每个自定义序列化提供程序，以便为特定数据类型返回一个序列化程序（如果自定义序列化提供程序可以提供序列化程序的话）。During serialization, each custom serialization provider is queried to return a serializer for a specific data type, if it can provide one. 序列化管理器在为特定类型使用默认序列化程序之前，使用此方法提供的自定义序列化程序。The serialization manager uses the custom serializer provided by this method before using the default serializer for a particular type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Context As ContextStack

summary.span: 获取基于堆栈的、用户定义的存储区域，该区域对于序列化程序之间的通信十分有用。

span.span: Gets a stack-based, user-defined storage area that is useful for communication between serializers.

value.span: 一个 ，其中包含有关当前要序列化的对象的信息。

span.span: A that contains information about the current object being serialized.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 部分序列化程序需要有关对象的上下文的信息，以便正确地保留其状态。Some serializers require information about the context of an object to correctly persist their state. 使序列化程序可以设置有关要序列化到 中（供其他序列化程序访问）的对象的上下文的数据。 enables a serializer to set data about the context of an object that it is serializing to a where another serializer can access it.

The associated with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks XML 限定名是命名空间限定的本地名称，格式为 namespace:localname。An XML qualified name is a namespace-qualified local name, in the format of namespace:localname. 由于前缀只在保留或读取 XML 时需要，因此它们对于 对象是不相关的。Because prefixes are only required when XML is persisted or read, they are irrelevant for objects. 确保本地名称不包含“:”是用户的责任It is the responsibility of the user to ensure the local name does not contain a ":"

exception.span: 包含空引用（在 Visual Basic 中为 ）。

span.span: The error to report.
Reports an error in serialization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `errorInformation` 可以为任意对象类型。`errorInformation` can be of any object type. 如果它是一个异常，则将提取该异常的消息并报告给用户。If it is an exception, the message of the exception is extracted and reported to the user. 如果它是任何其他类型，则将调用 ，向用户显示该信息。If it is any other type, is called to display the information to the user.
